content:
Thandi mises her
 schol bus 
 
 Melisa Chety
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thandi woke up hapy and she wanted
 
 to play before going to schol. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Grandma says to Thandi "you wil be late
 for your bus Thandi" 
 
 
 Thandi replies "I wil go now grandma"
 
 
 Thandi leaves 5 minutes later.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thandi goes to the bus stop to late.
 
 The bus has left. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The old man asked "why are you crying
 
 child" 
 
 Thandi replies "I mised my schol bus"
 
 
 The old man says "I wil walk you to
 
 schol". 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The old man askes Thandi "Is that your
 schol". 
 
 
 Thandi replies "Yes it is. Thank you"
 
 
 The old man leaves her at schol.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thandi tels her teacher and friend's
 
 about she mised her bus and the nice,
 old man who helped her. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 THE END 
 
 
 
 7
